articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'How can he…': Ex-IND selector takes aim at Suryakumar after batting slump - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Middle-order batter Suryakumar Yadav registered back-to-back golden ducks against Australia in the absence of injured batter Shreyas Iyer. The former India selector has backed Iyer to reclaim the No.4 batting spot in India's lineup at the ICC World Cup.  | Cr…
articles.content: When Australia toured India for the three-match One Day International (ODI) series, top-ranked T20I batter Suryakumar Yadav was heavily tipped to cement his place in India's world-class batting lineu… [+2404 chars]
